import React from "react"; import { MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBInput, MDBBtn } from "mdbreact"; class FormComponent extends React.Component { state = { email:"" }; submitHandler = event => { event.preventDefault(); event.target.className += " was-validated"; }; changeHandler = event => { this.setState({ [event.target.name]: event.target.value }); }; render() { return (

); } } export default FormComponent;
